org.mini2Dx.yarn.operation

Class YarnOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.yarn.operation.YarnOperation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    YarnAssign, YarnCommand, YarnEndIfBlock, YarnIfStatement, YarnLine, YarnOperationGroup, YarnOptionGroup

    public abstract class YarnOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for operations in the Yarn interpreter

    • Method Detail

      • resume

        public abstract int resume(YarnState yarnState,
                           java.util.List<YarnExecutionListener> listeners)
                    throws YarnExecutionException
        Resumes this operation
        Parameters:
        yarnState - The current YarnState
        listeners - A list YarnExecutionException to be notified of events
        Returns:
        The index of the next operation to execute, -1 if this operation is on-going
        Throws:
        YarnExecutionException - Thrown if an error occurs during execution

      • getOperationsOfType

        public <T extends YarnOperation> java.util.List<T> getOperationsOfType(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Returns a List for all Yarn operations of a given type. Note: This will flatten the node and include all possible branches.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The YarnOperation implementation to search for
        Returns:
        An empty List if there are no results

      • getOperationsOfType

        protected abstract <T extends YarnOperation> void getOperationsOfType(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                      java.util.List<T> result)

      • getOperationIndex

        public int getOperationIndex()
        The index for this operation
        Returns:
        The index of the operation in the node's list of operations

      • getLineNumber

        public int getLineNumber()
        The line number in the node corresponding to this operation
        Returns:
        The line number (0 = first line)

                         throws YarnExecutionException
        Throws:
